scripts.generate:theme: specify pull -C color-themes/general.js; specify pull -C color-themes/light-theme.js; specify extract -C color-themes/dark-theme.js;
scripts.generate:theme-json: specify pull -C color-themes-json/general.json; specify pull -C color-themes-json/light-theme.json; specify extract -C color-themes-json/dark-theme.json;
